resources.string: This is All app that I used to learn

Hi, my name is Thanh. 

I love Dragon. 

When I was young, I watched movies with Dragons, I always admired and liked them. They look very majestic, brave and powerful. 
At that time, I honestly wanted a dragon of my own. 

Later, I learned that Dragons are not real in the present. They are legends described by previous humans. 
So Dragons in Asia are different from Dragons in Europe. European Dragons have wings, big legs, and torso like dinosaurs. And the Asian Dragon is as long as a snake, has four legs and no wings. 

People still make movies about them today. And they are still fascinating legends when they appear in movies. Viewers, big or small, are still longing to see them once in real life. I myself, too. 

I want to be strong and proud like a Dragon, to be free to live like them. Want to become great, go into someone's legend. I want to be a Dragon. 
My nickname is T66, which means Thanh Dragons.
